resources.string: This app demonstrates the usage of CameraView. In order to do that, it needs permission to access camera.
Camera app cannot do anything without camera permission.
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
This app needs access to the camera in order to detect people’s faces.
This app can’t run because it doesn’t have permission to use the camera. It will now exit.
This app can’t download the face detector components it needs because this device has too little available storage.
